versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Sets up tracking mechanisms for goals

schema.prompt:
Design a comprehensive tracking system for the following goal and milestones:

Goal Definition: {{input.goalDefinition}}
Milestone Data: {{input.milestoneData}}
Action Plan Data: {{input.actionPlanData}}
Preferred Tracking Style: {{input.trackingStyle}}

Create a tracking system including:

1. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):
   - Quantitative metrics (numbers, percentages)
   - Qualitative metrics (ratings, descriptions)
   - Leading indicators (predict success)
   - Lagging indicators (confirm results)
   - Baseline measurements

2. Progress Tracking Methods:
   - Daily tracking items (habits, actions)
   - Weekly progress reviews
   - Monthly milestone checks
   - Visual tracking options (charts, graphs)
   - Simple scoring systems

3. Data Collection Design:
   - What to track (minimum viable data)
   - How to track (tools, methods)
   - When to track (frequency, triggers)
   - Where to track (apps, journals, spreadsheets)

4. Progress Indicators:
   - Green flags (on track)
   - Yellow flags (attention needed)
   - Red flags (intervention required)
   - Momentum indicators
   - Trend analysis

5. Review and Adjustment Protocol:
   - Review frequency and format
   - Adjustment triggers
   - Course correction methods
   - Celebration milestones

6. Motivation Maintenance:
   - Progress visualization
   - Streak tracking
   - Achievement badges/rewards
   - Social accountability options

Return as structured JSON with keys: trackingMetrics (array with type, frequency, method), progressIndicators (object with green/yellow/red flags), dataCollection (object), reviewProtocol (object), visualizationOptions (array), motivationSystem (object).

props.placeholder: Key milestones to track progress against...
Specific actions and tasks to track...

translations.description: Creates comprehensive tracking systems for goals with metrics and progress indicators
translations.instructions: Enter your goal and milestones. The system will design a complete tracking system with metrics, indicators, and review protocols.
translations.name: Tracker Setup
